MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-OCT-2020 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in KA8 postcode area of Ayr. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get all supplies back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:33pm on Monday 19th October 2020
